snippet: Inmates in California prisons will be permitted to marry same-sex partners who are not incarcerated, state officials announced.
abstract: California officials announce that inmates in state prisons will be permitted to marry same-sex partners who are not incarcerated; marriages between two inmates will not be permitted.
lead_paragraph: Inmates in California prisons will be permitted to marry same-sex partners who are not incarcerated, state officials announced.

headline.main: California: Prisons to Allow Same-Sex Marriages
headline.print_headline: California: Prisons To Allow Same-Sex Marriages

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
